Plot: In this special with Bill Maher, the political commentator and satirist discusses midterm elections, income inequality, the Republican psyche, a Trump lawsuit, why the Pope is an atheist and why tattoos are stupid.
Title: Bill Maher: Live from D.C.
Actors: Bill Maher, Patrick Moran Donovan, Michael Moore, Gale Nemec
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 1 nomination.
